body_html:
Hi Francisco,

I installed pytorch using conda (latest build):

karan@laptop:~$ conda list | grep torch
pytorch                   0.1.6                   py27_22    soumith
torch                     0.1.7                    py27_1    soumith
torchvision               0.1.7                    py27_1    soumith

on Ubuntu 16.04 with CUDA 8.0, CuDNN 5.1 and GPU Nvidia 940M.

body:
Hi Francisco,

I installed pytorch using conda (latest build):
```bash
karan@laptop:~$ conda list | grep torch
pytorch                   0.1.6                   py27_22    soumith
torch                     0.1.7                    py27_1    soumith
torchvision               0.1.7                    py27_1    soumith
```

on Ubuntu 16.04 with CUDA 8.0, CuDNN 5.1 and GPU [Nvidia 940M](http://www.geforce.com/hardware/notebook-gpus/geforce-940m).
